<onlyinclude>
== bUseVersionControl ==
* '''Default:''' <Code>0</Code>
Enables or disables [[Version Control]] within the [[Creation Kit]] editor.

'''Examples'''
<source lang="ini">
[General]
; The version control system is off.
bUseVersionControl=0
</Source>
<BR>
<source lang="ini">
[General]
; The version control system is on.
bUseVersionControl=1
</Source>
</onlyinclude>
